Text:
Thanks, was waiting for a HD version of this one to come out.  Nothing like watching the little girl from the Kick-Ass movie doing some more kick ass in this one.

She won't be able to watch any of the movies she is in for a long time due to their content...lol.

thank you

a pretty ok remake good for a few laughs

I highly recommend the swedish original for you out there that havent seen it.

http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/4754684/Let.The.Right.One.In.2008.LIMITED.1080p.BluRay.x264-BestHD

More than likely this is a DVD-R of the blue ray since it says "Source: blue ray" which means the source they recorded it from.  If this was directly from a Blue ray the dimensions would be 1920x800 and around 8 gigs or more to where this one is only 1280x536 at around 4 gigs which means it's compressed.
Downloaded 1/24 receive copyright notice 1/27. I updated my ipfilter.dat list right before downloading. Not complaining just an FYI.
Same here.  Downloaded 1/27, received copyright notice 1/28.  Be careful with this one.
This is the best movie in 2011 so far ! Excellent I give it 9 !!! Again Excellent story and directing !!!!

Cant wait to see this. i saw the sweedish version, it was ok, but i recomend everybody to read the book, im not the typical bookperson, and I usualy enjoi a movie rather than a book, but in this case, read the book!!!!
